commands.title: Insert or Update C/C++ Include Guard

C/C++ Include Guard.Auto Include Guard I.description: Automatically insert the include guard when adding a new header file

C/C++ Include Guard.Auto Update Include.markdownDescription: Automatically update the include guard when renaming a file (only have effect when macro type is `Filename` or `Filepath`

enumDescriptions: Random GUID v4. Separated by underscores.
File name of the current document. All non-alphanumeric characters are replaced with underscores.
File path of the current document. All non-alphanumeric characters are replaced with underscores. Works like Filename outside workspaces.
C/C++ Include Guard.Macro Type.description: Source of include guard macros. GUID, Filename or File Path.

C/C++ Include Guard.Path Depth.description: Number of folders which should be used for include guard. Disabled with 0.

C/C++ Include Guard.Prevent Decimal.description: Prevent GUIDs from starting with a decimal number.

C/C++ Include Guard.Prefix.description: Prefix added to include guard macros.

C/C++ Include Guard.Suffix.description: Suffix added to include guard macros.

C/C++ Include Guard.Skip Comment Blocks.description: Insert include guard beneath the first comment blocks.

C/C++ Include Guard.Insert Blank Line.description: Insert a blank line after the first comment blocks.

C/C++ Include Guard.Shorten Underscores.description: Shorten multiple underscores in filenames or file paths.

C/C++ Include Guard.Remove Extension.description: Remove file extension from include guard macros.
